channel.title: Tor browser not installed
channel.description:
Today after reinstalling whonix gate way and workstain and updating by sudo apt-get update and sudo apt-get dist upgrade I went to use tor browser and got a message that tor browser is not installed, I've never gotten this message before so I am not sure if its a trusted message......
The message/error was,
Torbrowser Update Check (Whonix)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Currently installed version: None installed . (/home/user/tor-browser_en-us does not exist. ) Online detected version(s) : 3.6.3
Install now? --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The reason I am paranoid is because if tor wanted to update it would atleast mention the previous version but in this case it say there is no version installed at all So please tell me whats going? thanks :-)

item.title: Tor browser not installed
item.dc:creator: ovais909
item.description:
[quote=“Patrick, post:2, topic:389”]This is expected.

I just now answered your question in the wiki so that everyone can read it.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Not_installed_by_Default[/quote]

Thanks again

Read full topic

item.title: Tor browser not installed
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is expected.

I just now answered your question in the wiki so that everyone can read it.

Whonix – 3 May 20

Tor Browser Basics

Using Tor Browser in Whonix ™. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update Tor Browser, Browser Plugins, Change Language

Read full topic

item.title: Tor browser not installed
item.dc:creator: ovais909
item.description:
Today after reinstalling whonix gate way and workstain and updating by sudo apt-get update and sudo apt-get dist upgrade
I went to use tor browser and got a message that tor browser is not installed, I’ve never gotten this message before so I am not sure if its a trusted message…

The message/error was,

Torbrowser Update Check (Whonix)

Currently installed version: None installed . (/home/user/tor-browser_en-us does not exist. )
Online detected version(s) : 3.6.3

Install now?

The reason I am paranoid is because if tor wanted to update it would atleast mention the previous version but in this case it say there is no version installed at all
So please tell me whats going?
thanks

Read full topic
